text: sanury hwla' almukadhibin ayatina min alftwhat wazuhur al'islam ealaa al'aqalim wsayr aladyan, wafi 'aqtar alsamawat walard, wama yhdthh allah fihima min alhawadith alezymt, wafi 'anfusihim wama ashtamalat ealayh min badie ayat allah wejayb sneh, hataa yatabayan lahum min tilk alayat bayan la yaqbal alshaku 'ana alquran alkarim hu alhaqu almwhaa bih man rabu alealmyn. 'awalam yakfihim dalilana ealaa 'an alquran hq, wman ja' bih sadq, shahadat allah teala? fa'iinah qad shahid lah baltsdyq, wahu ealaa kl shay' shhyd, wala shay' 'akbar shahadatan min shahadatih subhanah wteala
